sentences.en: The impresario had buttoned his astrakhan coat.
sentences.cn: 乐团经理扣好了羔皮外套.

sentences.en: The impresario will present an expanded series of concerts next season.
sentences.cn: 下个季节将举办一次大型的系列音乐会.

words.tran_cn: （意）（歌剧、乐团等的）演出者；经理人；乐队指挥，导演

trans.tran_en: An impresario is a person who arranges for plays, concerts, and other entertainments to be performed
